name: Chekrut Hound
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Chekrut" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Chekrut Hound". If this card is in your GY, and you control a "Chekrut" monster: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Chekrut" monster from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Hound" once per turn.
